title: Active substance from plant slows down aggressive eye cancer

title_detail.value: Active substance from plant slows down aggressive eye cancer

summary: An active substance that has been known for 30 years could unexpectedly turn into a ray of hope against eye tumors. This is shown by a new study. The plant leaves of which contain the tested substance is anything but rare: At Christmas time you can find it in every well-assorted garden center.
